<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="2004" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition, lemma" language="en">
	<chunk type="ADVP">
		<word type="RB" lemma="now">Now</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type="DT" lemma="all">all</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN" lemma="of">of</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="PRP" lemma="us">us</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="MD" lemma="can">can</word>
		<word type="VB" lemma="talk">talk</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type="TO" lemma="to">to</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT" lemma="the">the</word>
		<word type="NNP" lemma="nsa">NSA</word>
		<word type="NNP" lemma="—">—</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="ADVP">
		<word type="RB" lemma="just">just</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN" lemma="by">by</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="VP">
			<word type="VBG" lemma="dial">dialing</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="DT" lemma="any">any</word>
			<word type="NN" lemma="number">number</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type="." lemma=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","8"
